itunes:title: 240 - 3 Ways to Get Back On The Right Path When You Feel Lost
itunes:author: andy j miller, alex sugg, lisa congdon, yoni wolf
itunes:summary:
It's so easy to get lost. The creative path is a treacherous journey, with numerous pitfalls and distractions.

AND

I don't know about you... but...

ALL MY PRODUCTIVITY STOPS when I start feeling lost and I can't remember where I'm going, what to do next or even why I'm on this path in the first place.

Early in my career this feeling would nearly sink my ship and throw me off for weeks, but over time, I've learned some insights that help me course correct so I can recalibrate and spend as much time as possible squarely at the center of my creative calling.

If you feel lost today I encourage you to listen in and find 3 techniques for getting back on YOUR path TODAY!
